statements: UPDATE BudgetData SET expenditure_amount = 5000.00, budget_amount = 10000.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE BudgetData SET department_name = 'Marketing', budget_amount = 15000.00 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE BudgetData SET expenditure_amount = 5000.75, budget_amount = 10000.50 WHERE department_name = 'Marketing';
UPDATE BudgetData SET budget_amount = 15000.25, expenditure_amount = 7500.50, date_reported = '2021-08-15' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE BudgetData SET budget_amount = 50000.00 WHERE budget_id = 101
UPDATE CostBenefitAnalysis SET analysis_type = 'Quarterly' WHERE analysis_id = 201
UPDATE BudgetData SET budget_amount = 15000.00 WHERE budget_id = 101 AND fiscal_year = 2022;
UPDATE CostBenefitAnalysis SET benefit_amount = 12000.50, cost_amount = 8000.75 WHERE analysis_id = 201 AND analysis_type = 'Financial';
UPDATE budget_data SET expense_amount = 1500 WHERE department = 'HR';
UPDATE analysis_results SET cost_benefit_ratio = 2.5, analysis_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE result_id = 3;
UPDATE budget_data SET expense_amount = expense_amount + 2000 WHERE department = 'Marketing';
UPDATE policies SET end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE policy_id = 5;
UPDATE BudgetData SET expense_amount = 5000.00 WHERE budget_id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectDetails SET end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE project_id = 3;
UPDATE BudgetData SET expense_amount = 5000 WHERE budget_id = 1;
UPDATE CostAnalysis SET cost_estimate = 75000, benefit_estimate = 100000 WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE BudgetData SET actual_amount = 5000.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Projects SET budget_amount = 15000.00, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE BudgetData SET actual_amount = actual_amount + 500, variance = budget_amount - (actual_amount + 500) WHERE category = 'Office Supplies';
UPDATE Expenses SET amount = amount * 1.1 WHERE project_id = 3;
